version_description:
1. The transition to a new graphic engine is completed, so the game runs much smoother and faster.
2. Artifacts can be now purchased in the shop to further customise your team.
3. Enabled sharing of your account with different devices via iCloud.
4. Fixed an issue with menu scaling on iPhone 6.
5. Fixed an issue with trimmed friend lists.
6. Fixed a huge number of bugs.

1. Fixed desync issues
2. Fixed parameters of Master's shurikens weapon
3. Fixed boss Maniacs rope hook issues

- Superbosses: battle against two dangerous enemies at once together with a friend or a stranger!
- The long-awaited crafting update: you can now craft hats!
- New bosses for the single player mode.
- New hats, weapons and maps.
- No more losing immediately if your connection is lost during a PvP battle - instead, you will be automatically reconnected to the game!
- General performance improvements.
- Other bug fixes.

- Fixed desync issues in different battle modes
- Fixed bugs in select friend for battle menu
- Other bug fixes

- Added new battle maps
- Added new weapon upgrades
- Fixed a game freeze that occured while listening to music on external apps
- Other bug fixes

- Players with VIP account now get double coins and experience for accomplished missions and boss fights.
- Major update to graphics engine - the game's performance is greatly improved.
- Added VK support that will become available shortly after release. Wormix then will be automatically added to VK game catalogue.
- Fixed a number of bugs and glitches

- Added global chat panel
- Updated AI of computer opponents
- Added bosses achievements for Zombie King, Ancient Ghost and Engineer
- Added weapon upgrades for Dynamite, Girder and Carpet Bazooka
- Fixed errors with VKontakte authorization after password changed

- VIP account for the month grants two free character renames
- New co-op boss battle mode
- New craft items
- New weapons
- New weapon upgrades
- Sets of stickers
- Added a button to receive/cancel incoming calls to the main menu
- Character menu revamp: new battle invitation and other functions
- Battle maps graphics update
- Arsenal weapon positions were rearranged
- AOE damage increased to 300 from 200
- Player ID in the global chatroom
- Rating's top hats are given only if the player's daily rating is not less than 500
- Big fixes

- The new main menu appearance
- Friends list moved to the main menu sidebar
- New weapons
- The new boss: Arhidemon
- New crafts
- Burning fires performance optimization
- Hats parameters updated
- Burning ram damage fix
- Dodge mechanic change
- Improved network connection stability
- DnD button moved to the settings menu

– Added clans, clan tops and seasons!
– Partial weapon purchase is now available
– Added craft bundles to the store
– Increased FPS
– Made changes to the balance of weapons, upgrades and races
– Improved performance
– Various bug fixes

• Made changes to the balance of weapons and upgrades
• Various bug fixes
